title: Character Creation
content:
on Details in BG3

Baldur's Gate 3 offers a new in-depth Character Creation and Customization system to give players the ability to express how they want to portray their characters and make their imaginations a reality, which is an important aspect in all Dungeons & Dragon games. This gives players additional customization options that adjust according to the chosen Race.
